title: NBC logo
content:
Can anyone identify the font used in the current NBC logo? I have come as close as Geometric 415, but the B and C are not quite right. Thanks for any help.   
 ![NBClogo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131204204044im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70789.jpg)
author: knharper

comments.content:
No doubt created by hand by a big corporate identity firm, perhaps based on Geometric.   
   
Edit: yup, it's custom, created by [Chermayeff & Geismar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131204204044/http:/www.cgnyc.com/identities/nbc.html) in 1986
